GapFillInput.Title: The Title
GapFillInput.Instruction: Listen to the video of people talking about times in different countries and click on the correct answer.

Content.Question:
Woman: Hello. A single to Manchester please.
Assistant: Single to … That’s £21.00|21.
Woman: Thanks. What time’s the next train?
Assistant: Er … Half past 10.
Woman: And which platform is it?
Assistant: Platform 3.
Woman: Thanks.
Assistant: Goodbye.
Man: Good morning, I’d like a return to Cardiff, please, for next Tuesday.
Assistant: That’s Tuesday 25th?
Man: Yes, that’s right.
Assistant: Right … so what time do you want to travel?
Man: I need to be in Cardiff at 11 o’clock,
11 in the morning …
Assistant: So you need the 8.20.
Man: What time does it arrive?
Assistant: At 10.50.
Man: Fine.
Assistant: That’s £40.25 please.
PS: Thank you very much.
